div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?
In teen years time, I will be 29.
I think I will already have one or two small children. I will live with them and my futur husband in my own house. I will not have a dog beacause I'm affraid of, but I will probably have a cat.
I really hope I will get a job I will love.
I will also travel a lot. If it is not for my work, it will be for my own pleasur.
